resources.string:
1. Find a well-lit, flat surface (like a floor or table).
2. Move your device slowly, pointing it at the surface to scan it.
3. Once the surface is detected, the artifact will appear.
4. Pinch with two fingers to resize the artifact.
5. Use two fingers and twist to rotate the artifact.
6. Use the Lock/Unlock button to enable/disable resizing and rotation.
This is a detailed description of the woodcutter frame artifact. Mention its history, significance, materials, etc.
Information about the \'Tex\' artifact goes here. Describe what it is, its context, etc.
Details about the boom microphone model. Explain its use, components, or relevance.
